title: A magnitude 4.8 earthquake rattled New Jersey this morning around 10:23am. I...
content:
A magnitude 4.8 earthquake rattled New Jersey this morning around 10:23am. I felt it up here in Vermont too â€” just a little shimmy that lasted for maybe 8-9 seconds. April blizzard, earthquake, eclipseâ€¦all perfectly normal stuff going on here.
